title: Chessboard with Python
description: A chessboard is the type of game board used for the game of chess, on which pawns and chess pieces are placed. A chessboard is usually square, with an alternating pattern of squares of two colours. In this article, I’ll walk you through how to create and visualize a chessboard with the Python programming language.
description_lemmatized: chessboard type game board used game chess pawn chess piece placed chessboard usually square alternating pattern square two colour article ill walk create visualize chessboard python programming language
